== Karakulam (CT) (628504) ==

Karakulam (CT) is a town in the [[Nedumangad]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 13.3 sq. km. and harbouring 7689 households with total population of 29624 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 14420 and female population is 15204. Scheduled Caste population is 2043 and Scheduled Tribes population is 115. Census Location Code of the town is 628504<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 10 km. Railway station is at Thiruvananthapuram at a distance of 10 km.
